meanings.definition: Lazulites: a blue mineral consisting of hydrated basic copper aluminum phosphate.
meanings.sent1: The lazulites sparkled in the sunlight, showing off their beautiful blue color.
meanings.sent2: The jeweler carefully examined the lazulites to determine their quality.
meanings.sent3: The lazulites decided to take a break from being underground and enjoy the sunshine.
meanings.sent4: The lazulites in the cave were like tiny fragments of the sky trapped in stone.
meanings.sent5: The lazulites shimmered like fragments of the ocean, captivating all who saw them.

meanings.definition: Lazulites: a group of people who are lazy or unmotivated.
meanings.sent1: The lazulites lounged around all day, not wanting to do anything productive.
meanings.sent2: The manager had to motivate the lazulites to finish their tasks on time.
meanings.sent3: The lazulites joked about starting a club for the laziest people in town.
meanings.sent4: The lazulites were like a herd of sloths, moving at a snail's pace.
meanings.sent5: The lazulites seemed content to let the world pass them by, unaffected by its hustle and bustle.
